body:
Hi Xiaojian,



Your file works fine on my machine. Did you check [this?](http://www.grasshopper3d.com/group/ladybug/forum/topics/psychrometric-chart-crashing?commentId=2985220%3AComment%3A1547033&groupId=2985220%3AGroup%3A658987) and [this?](http://www.grasshopper3d.com/group/ladybug/forum/topics/psychrometric-chart-crashes-when-connects-windspeed)



Devang
